meta.content: Mulvane School District USD 263 - Food Service at Mulvane School District During Covid 19 Disruption

03/25/2020:
We will be serving items such as chicken nuggets, cheeseburgers, cheese quesadillas and other items cold. We have decided for food safety and ease of serving that we will serve all menu items cold. All items have been cooked and cooled in our school kitchens following our standard food safety practices. These items may be eaten by your children cold as they will be served or may be reheated if...

meta.title: Mulvane School District USD 263 - Food Service at Mulvane School District During Covid 19 Disruption

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rainfall. High near 63. East wind 10 to 16 mph becoming north northeast in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

Showers and thunderstorms likely, mainly before 7pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, then gradually becoming partly cloudy, with a low around 51. North wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
Sunny, with a high near 76. West northwest wind 6 to 10 mph becoming south southwest in the afternoon.

div.div: Your session will expire in 0 minutes.

div.h3: Food Service at Mulvane School District During Covid 19 Disruption

span.span: We will be serving items such as chicken nuggets, cheeseburgers, cheese quesadillas and other items cold. We have decided for food safety and ease of serving that we will serve all menu items cold. All items have been cooked and cooled in our school kitchens following our standard food safety practices. These items may be eaten by your children cold as they will be served or may be reheated if desired.Â

New Information 03/24/20: We have received new updated information. We will not be able to offer weekend meals. We are sorry with the change but there had been confusion at the state level that has been corrected.
We will have Meal service as planned M-F with a lunch and breakfast offered to each child between the ages of 1-18 each day.
Â
03/24/2020Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â
Meal service during the Covid19 disruptionÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â
Dear Parent/GuardianÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

The Mulvane USD 263 Administration & Food Service Department have been working on plans for providing meals to USD 263 students and area children during the Covid-19 disruption of the regularly scheduled school year. We are working on the plan details, logistics and menus at this time. We plan to start meal service this coming Tuesday March 24th.

We will be offering free meals to all children between the ages of 1-18 under the Summer Food Service Program. The child does not need to be enrolled in the Mulvane USD 263 District. We will be using bus routes, pick up locations and a drive thru site to distribute these meals. Each child will receive a lunch on the day of pickup and a breakfast for the next day.
Current Information

We will have a drive thru pick up site at the Mulvane Grade School 411 Se Louis Blvd. We ask that you enter the bus lane from the south end and will exit out to K-15. Students may also pick up meals at this location on foot.Â Hours of operation 11 am - 1 pm.Â
Route locations and estimated times are below as well as route maps.
All children between the ages of 1-18 are allowed a meal at no charge. The child does not need to be a Mulvane USD 263 student.
We are not allowed to distribute meals for any child that is not present at the pickup spot. We are sorry this is a current USDA mandate and not our rule.
All Pickup, grab and go and route sites are non-congregate feeding. We will not have any locations open for on-site feeding.
All times are approximate and may be adjusted as we move forward. Please check our website for any updates to times & locations.
Please navigate to our normal web page for planned menus.
Â
Planned Bus RoutesÂ
Stop #1: 95th & Lulu 11 am -11:10 am
Stop #2: Broadway & 95th 11:15 am - 11:30 am
Stop #3: S Stearns St & W 95th St S 11:35 am - 11:45 am
Stop #4: 103rd St & Ct 11:50 am - 11:55 am
Stop #5: Peck Post Office 12:00 pm - 12:15 pm
Stop #6: River Vista 12:20 pm - 12:35 pm
Stop #1: Greenfield 11 am -11:15 am
Stop #2: Fortner 11:20 am - 11:35 am
Stop #3: Paradise Valley 11:50 am - 12:10 pm
Stop #4: Box Elder 12:15 pm - 12:30 pm
Stop #1: Mulvane Middle School 11 am -11:15 am
Stop #2: Mulvane Public Library 11:20 am - 11:40 am
Stop #3: Fairchild Ball field 11:45 am - 12:00 pmÂ Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â
Stop #1 Mulvane High School 11:00 am â 11:20 am
Stop #2 Country Walk Park 11:25 am â 11:40 am
Stop #3 Rockwood Park 11:45 am â 12:00 pm
Stop #1: Osage Acres 11 am -11:10 am
Stop #3: Ponderosa & 119th 11:35 am - 11:45 am
Stop #4: Prairie Schooner Mobile Home Park 11:50 am - 12:00 pm
Stop #5: 106th St Ct & Webb 12:10 pm - 12:20 pm
